personal_info.summary: Passionate about programming and robotics, with an outstanding track record in national and international competitions. My experience includes leading teams in robotics tournaments, mentoring in programming, and creating innovative technological solutions.

education.additional_info: Honorable Mention for performance in programming and robotics olympiads.

education.degree: Diploma in Web and Mobile Application Development

projects.name: Morelos Informatics Competition 2021
projects.description: Won a silver medal in C++ programming, demonstrating advanced skills in algorithms and data structures against dozens of competitors.

projects.name: Mexican Olympiad in Informatics 2022
projects.description: Ranked in the Top 100 nationwide, competing against Mexico's best young programmers by solving highly complex algorithmic problems.

projects.name: Google Programming Communities Cup 2024
projects.description: Participated in an international event organized by Google, testing my problem-solving skills against programmers from around the world.

projects.name: Programming and Robotics Mentor
projects.description: Trained students for national and international competitions, helping them achieve multiple medals in robotics and programming tournaments.

projects.name: Technological Innovation Project
projects.description: Developed a Spanish-based programming language for Arduino robots, earning second place in a national contest and used it in the robots that won at Riotronic, a competition in Ecuador.
